class.name: SEOBox3D
class.description: This node allows you to create a box for use with the SEO system. [b]Note:[/b] SEO nodes are intended to be used for level prototyping. Creating SEO nodes has a significant CPU cost compared to creating a [SEMesh] with a [PrimitiveMesh]. Moving a SEO node within another SEO node also has a significant CPU cost, so it should be avoided during gameplay.

members.member: The material used to render the box.
The box's width, height and depth.
